projects.title: Auxly Website
projects.description: Auxly is a top 5 Canadian licensed producer of cannabis made up cannabis enthusiasts, entrepreneurs and researchers with a belief in quality innovation and building authentic connections with consumers. The objective of their website was to give an overview of their inhouse brands, while providing a place their investor relations team a platform to easily update the latest PR documents and accouncements for the public.
